title: 103_hr1444
content: Payment of benefits for the month of recipient's death. The amendment to the Social Security Act includes changes to old-age insurance benefits and wife's insurance benefits, specifically regarding the month in which benefits end. The Social Security Act is amended to change old-age insurance benefits and wife's insurance benefits, including the month benefits end and husband's insurance benefits. The Social Security Act is amended to change child's insurance benefits and widow's insurance benefits. Amendments include changes to the month benefits end and eligibility criteria. The Social Security Act is amended to change widow's insurance benefits, including the end of benefits and eligibility criteria for widowers and parents. The Social Security Act is amended to change insurance benefits for widows, widowers, and parents, including adjustments to the end of benefits and eligibility criteria. The Social Security Act is amended to adjust disability insurance benefits, benefits at age 72 for certain uninsured individuals, and computation of last monthly payment for old-age and survivors insurance benefits. The last payment of monthly insurance benefit was terminated due to death. The monthly insurance benefit for an individual who dies will be calculated based on the number of days in the month before their death. This calculation applies after all other adjustments to the benefit have been made. Disability insurance benefits under Section 223 of the Act are amended to include a new subsection. "Last Payment of Benefit Terminated by Death" The amount of an individual's monthly benefit under this section paid for the month of their death is calculated based on a fraction of days in that month. This applies after all other adjustments to the benefit have been made. Additionally, benefits at age 72 are provided for certain uninsured individuals. Benefits at age 72 for uninsured individuals are provided under Section 228 of the Act. The last payment of benefits terminates upon death, with the amount calculated based on the days in the month before the individual's death. This adjustment applies after all other benefit adjustments have been made. The amendments made by this Act will apply to deaths occurring after the enactment date.
